name: Pending
description: Limited access to certain features (e.g., cannot perform sensitive operations like changing email or password). The system may send an email or SMS to prompt the user to verify.
when_to_apply: When the user has signed up, but their email or phone number needs to be verified (common in systems with two-factor authentication or email confirmation).

name: Active
description: User can access all available features of the application. Can be updated when a user is performing normal operations.
when_to_apply: This is the default status when the user has successfully signed up, verified their email, and is actively using the platform.

name: Inactive
description: The user is still part of the system but does not have access to the core features. Could require a reactivation step (like email verification or password reset).
when_to_apply: When the user has not logged in for a certain period (e.g., months) or has not completed necessary steps (e.g., failed verification).
how_to_reset: Reactivation step (like email verification or password reset).

name: Suspended
description: The user cannot log in or access the platform. The system may notify the user of the suspension and reasons for it.
when_to_apply: When the user violates the platform's terms of service or engages in malicious behavior, leading to a temporary block on their account.
how_to_reset: Wait for the suspension is over or contact support for further assistance.

name: Banned
description: The user is permanently prevented from accessing the platform. Banning is irreversible, and the system may send a final notice about the ban.
when_to_apply: When the user has committed severe violations of the platform's terms of service, leading to a permanent ban.

name: Deactivated
description: The account is still stored in the system, but the user cannot log in or use the platform. May allow the user to reactivate their account within a grace period before full deletion.
when_to_apply: When the user decides to leave or delete their account, but the account is not yet fully deleted.

name: Locked
description: The account is temporarily locked to prevent further login attempts, and the user may need to perform a password reset to regain access.
when_to_apply: When a user exceeds the maximum number of failed login attempts (e.g., 5 incorrect passwords).
how_to_reset: Wait for the exceeds time over or contact admin team

name: Deleted
description: The user's data is removed from the system (unless retention policies apply). The account is completely removed from the system.
when_to_apply: When the user requests the complete deletion of their account or the system automatically deletes an inactive account after a certain period.
